channel.title: Hdd question :s
channel.description:
I want to make sure I'm right before I do it..
If I buy a 1tb SATA hdd and external enclosure with usb as the adapter or w.e, would it work on my computer only supports IDE (I know sad :()
Offtopic: I have a dual boot, Linux is chosen as the main boot how can I switch it to Windows?

item.title: Hdd question :s
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Yes, it will work.

And yes, you can change the default booting OS, search google for your setup.

Read full topic

item.title: Hdd question :s
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

I bought something similar to that what you said, and I hope it arrives today. Anyway, it will work. The data goes trough the usb cable, not the sata cable.

Bootloader shouldn’t matter.

Read full topic

item.title: Hdd question :s
item.dc:creator: @Payback_Is_A_Bitch Payback Is A Bitch
item.description:
@Payback_Is_A_Bitch wrote:

[quote=“chrisn2323, post:2, topic:239795”]an external drive should work through USB

which bootloader are you using? NTLoader or grub?[/quote]Dont know the difference

Read full topic
